Class DBQuery.Query

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing class:
    DBQuery

    public static class DBQuery.Query
extends DBQuery.AbstractBuilder<DBQuery.Query>
    This is a query builder that is also a valid query that can be passed to MongoDB
